Subjective: Extreme fatigue x2 months. Wakes up tired despite sleeping a lot. Sleep possibly superficial. No clear precipitating event. Can still climb/cycle but feels more muscle soreness & back pain. Work is difficult but not impossible. No sick leave taken. No snoring. No specific joint pain, but some morning stiffness. No significant cardiac, respiratory, GI complaints. Allergies controlled.
Objective: BP 110/60. HR 40-50. Lungs clear. Mild tenderness lower back on palpation. No gross abnormalities on exam. No specific joint pain elicited.
Assessment: Fatigue, etiology unclear. To rule out anemia, thyroid dysfunction, inflammation.
Plan:
- Bloedonderzoek: Hb, TSH, ontstekingsfactoren (CRP/bezinking).
- Uitslagen dag na prikken beschikbaar.
- Telefonische afspraak plannen na ontvangst uitslagen.
- Formulier voor bloedafname via e-mail.
